problem.p: Should the longer dimension of a rectangular beam be oriented vertically or horizontally to minimize the deflection due to a vertical load?

choicegroup.label: If the wood beam shown below is replaced with a steel beam of the exact same dimensions, what will happen to the bending moments along the length of the beam? Assume the loading remains the same.

div.p: Orienting the longer dimension vertically will result in smaller deflections - try it!
